entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, mentioned as 'H ARRY  POTTER' in the first line.

entities.name: myrtle
entities.description: A character who is blushing and has a fondness for Harry Potter, mentioned as 'Myrtle' in the second line.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, mentioned as 'Ron' in the third line.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is Harry's sister and Ron's girlfriend, mentioned as 'Ginny' in the fourth line.

entities.name: fawkes
entities.description: A phoenix who is leading the way for Harry and his friends, mentioned as 'Fawkes' in the eighth line.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: A professor at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, mentioned as 'Professor McGonagall's office' in the tenth line.

relationships.description: Myrtle has a fondness for Harry Potter, as mentioned in the second line.
Ron is Ginny's boyfriend, implied by the context of the story.
Fawkes is leading the way for Harry and his friends, as mentioned in the eighth line.
